app.title: Guess 'em all
app.offline-installed: This website is ready for offline usage!
app.offline-updated: This website is updated, please refresh!

dialog.content: The current game will be stopped and all progress will be lost.
dialog.title: Are you sure you want to start a new game?

rules.1: One of the team members tries to describe the words on the card, the other team members must guess these words.
rules.2: The player who describes the words may not name names on the card. Words such as "the" and "a" are allowed.
rules.3: The player who describes the words may not name names derived from the name on the card.
rules.4: The player who describes the words may not apply "sounds like" or "rhymes to" tactics.
rules.5: The player who describes the words may not refer to letters of the alphabet.
rules.6: The player who describes the words may not point at objects.
rules.7: Humming, singing and gestures are allowed.
rules.8: After half a minute the time is up, and nothing more can be said or guessed.
rules.9: The player who described the words indicates which words are guessed, each word is worth one point.

teams.intro: Choose your teams! Two teams is the minimum and all teams must consist of at least two players.
teams.title: Teams
